attributes.action: make statues of katie houseman and put them in every town city and village
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i think as a country we should make giant statues of Katie houseman, and her Mum as shes fit too, and put them in every town, village and city. these statues hsould be of them naked so all can see how fit they are.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
